column4: Hi, while trying to upgrade Ubuntu 9.04 to 9.10, I get a list of error messages saying "Failed to fetch" and some url. Can I not upgrade?

Hi, while trying to upgrade my Ubuntu version, I also get the error message "Some third party entries in your sources.list were disabled. You can re-enable them after the upgrade with the 'software-properties' tool or your package manager.". How to fix it ?
you may need to fresh install a current version.

I shouldnt need to format my harddisk to upgrade the dist, theres a reason Ubuntu comes with an upgrade tool. Formatting and doing a fresh install is waaay to much work, also I don't have 500 DVD-R's to backup
